name: Optimus Property Solutions, Property Sales & Management

google_reviews.author: A G
google_reviews.review: Refused to fix issues during my one year lease and decided to fabricate charges after I left. Claimed I took down shower doors when they were in the garage from day one. Claimed a screen was missing when it was in the garage. Handed me the Without cleaning it and now wants to bill me seven hours for cleaning it at the end. No one is in their office on the weekends and they expect Im supposed to wait until Monday to return the keys. The bare minimum contact I had was with Kashia DeMerice who provided zero support.

google_reviews.author: Allison Jones
google_reviews.review: Do not rent from Optimus. They work with a verbally abusive and threatening property owner named Iva Smetana who lives in Ferndale. She owns the apartments at Eagle Pkwy in Ferndale, under the name Smetana 1 LLC, which is publicly available information on the assessors website. At least several former tenants have witnessed her be cruel to a disabled person, and yell at a mother in front of her children, and Iva calls the cops on tenants if they put too much in the dumpster. She will be looking through the dumpster with a flashlight late at night to find out who it was. Optimus has always done her bidding, posting notes on doors when shed get mad and tell them to. They probably dont stand up to her because theyre afraid of her too. Do not rent from Optimus. Anyone who cant stand up to Iva shouldnt be operating a property management business. And, if you value your safety, DO NOT MOVE TO EAGLE PKWY.

google_reviews.author: Boney Tiger
google_reviews.review: They are a-holes, lack social skills when dealing with tenants. They don't solve simple problems that take very little effort. The trash is constantly everywhere can't even walk in that area to toss it, very hazardous. Take long time to respond to time sensitive problems or basic maintenance. They are running out the long time tenants with rent increases every year and a ton of legal paperwork just to maintain a lease, but you will never hear from them unless it's a mean text talking down on tenants like we're children.

google_reviews.author: Riley Ball
google_reviews.review: During the last month in my studio apartment, they left me without a garbage disposal for a month. After move out, they charged me $175 for 4 electric stove drip pans, and an $80 cleaning fee when the place was spotless. There were two tiny spots on the wall that needed touch ups. Stay away from these people and avoid the headache. Kashia was my property manager.

google_reviews.author: Hansen Curt
google_reviews.review: Bad place to rent from they never communicate or do nothing to fix anything. My rental was a dump had no ventilation whatsoever. Keisha is the worst person to work with she is very unprofessional she doesn't have any communication skills. I have been sending in request for repairs for over three years and they tried to make it seem like it was our fault. Never rent from Optimus Property Solutions. They wrongfully evicted us we our disabled and we were behind on rent. I refuse to pay rent for filth and black mold. We our now homeless because of Optimus Property Solutions. They should be called Optimus Property destroyers .

google_reviews.author: Whitney Misja
google_reviews.review: We rented from here for 7 years. Julia was our property manager and we cannot say enough good things about her! She is kind, friendly, approachable and  quick to respond and take care of whatever needs to be taken care of. Highly recommend Optimusbonus if you get to work with Julia!

google_reviews.author: Julie Roman
google_reviews.review:
Julia went above and beyond today in walking us though a solution to a problem we were having with flooding in a unit.  She was very knowledgable and patient with us as she thoroughly explained the process.

We have used Optimus for several years, both as property managers and as a service to find and vet potential renters for our properties.  We have been very pleased with their services and highly recommend them.

google_reviews.author: Ezra Moore
google_reviews.review:
"Optimus Property Solutions? More like Optimus Prime of property management! As their IT vendor sidekick, I've gotta say, these folks are top-notch. Professionalism? Check. They sync up with our team like a dream. And kindness? Double check. When tech gremlins attacked, they didn't just stand by; they dove into the trenches with us, showing patience and support that would make your grandma proud.

But it's not all serious business. Their team has a way of making even the driest property management talk feel like a chat over coffee. They've mastered the art of being pros while keeping it light and human, which in my book, makes them property management rockstars. If you're on the hunt for a property management crew that brings both brains and heart to the table, along with a few laughs, look no further than Optimus Property Solutions. They're not just managing properties; they're elevating the game."

google_reviews.author: Caryn Scheffer
google_reviews.review: Response time is considerably slow once you become a tenant.  Almost as if you are intentionally being ignored.  However, when washer and dryer didn't work to complete a single load, service was contacted immediately.  When the dryer was identified as non-repairable, a new one of a similar model was ordered and delivered within 3 days.  Housekeeping/ cleaning service hired to clean the home prior to move-in date did a horrible job.  They should find a different cleaning company.

google_reviews.author: Lauren Rogers
google_reviews.review: We've had our ups and down  (who hasn't with property management at a mobile home park?) but when it comes down to it, Julia has been an understanding and reasonable property manager, and not to mention, kind. She is always calm and clear with her expectations and that is vital as sometimes emotions can run a little high if issues arise! She is definitely very good at her job in that way, I can truly attest to that. I think lots of the issues we've dealt with in our park have been outside of the scope of Optimus' management of the park. While that's been hard to navigate, it's not their fault. She has shown that she cares and is willing to work with people, especially us. We know that she didn't need to be as understanding and patient as she has been with us over the years, and since our livelihood literally depends on it, we are grateful to her for sure.

google_reviews.author: Scott
google_reviews.review: Be careful if you rent a property through Optimus. They charged us $315 of our security deposit for "general cleaning" despite that we left the property spotless. The lease allowed cleaning only if we left the property dirty and we provided an extensive number of photos proving the property did not need cleaning (we spent hours scrubbing the house and leaving it clean). We asked them what needed to be cleaned by them and they were unable to answer that and said that since the cleaners were already paid there is no way to refund us. I would not rent through them again given what feels like a deceptive and dishonest business practice.

google_reviews.author: Ellen Yacknin
google_reviews.review: As B'ham property owners, we feel lucky to be able to work with and rely on Suzzanne at Optimus.  She is professional, easy to work with, extremely responsive to our concerns, always cheerful (even when she is having a bad day!), and always offers sensible advice. Our tenants have never complained that problems are not resolved quickly. Thank you.

google_reviews.author: Terry Fine
google_reviews.review: We have rented with Optimus for a couple of years now.  I have been in PropertyManagement for 25 plus years, so I can say with certainty that this company is very professional in every thing they have done for us.  I've read all these reviews and honestly believe these people that make complaints have issues...not Optimus....  If you're looking for a rental, this is the best company to rent from, and if you're selling or buying...Julia is the best to work with.

google_reviews.author: Edwin Sepos
google_reviews.review: Showed up on time, knew what the homeowner wanted and brought to our attention, pleasant to speak with. However we drove across the country to see a home that had a line of people already waiting, if I would have known that I would have saved a lot of gas and the yard hadn't been cleaned up to the point I couldn't really see what was going in on. Didn't get the house, but that's not any fault of Optimus

google_reviews.author: just me
google_reviews.review: I've been renting with Drayton harbor realty for about 10 years till Monte past away and Optimus took over. I'll say as soon as that happened my rent went up $200 and I'll say Julia was the worst person you can ever communicate with. We finally found a house we bought and gave them a notice of vacancy. Recently Julia came by  and was taking pictures of the house and my wife asked what's going on thinking it was the HOA. Unfortunately the reply my wife gets is " mind your own f@#$ business". So my wife takes a few pictures of her just in case and Julia stops her truck, sticks her head out and rudely shouts "you want me to get  out and pose?"  I then called and headed to the office to have a conversation with Gary I believe..by the time I arrived office was closed and no one was there @1pm.. interesting how 10 minutes was a hard time to wait for me to arrive? Since then I haven't had a phone call back or no answers of why Julias actions were so unprofessional and rude.

google_reviews.author: Velvet Humphres
google_reviews.review: This is the best company I have ever rented from in whatcom county. The receptionist is so kind and very helpful. The person who works on finances/book keeping is a gem. The lease was very straight forward and not in anyway overbearing to read. If we need to end up moving and we choose to rent again, I will look at what they have available first. I wish more real estate management companies in whatcom were like this!

google_reviews.author: Matt
google_reviews.review: Shady dealings and slum lords, fix 3 year old problems and have them stick worker with the bill and parts. Trailer parks are filled with used needle rigs and overflowing trash.

google_reviews.author: Ava Sakowski
google_reviews.review: These folks are an excellent property management company. They are extremely responsive. However I know that has a lot to do with the landlord who is also very responsive to property needs.

google_reviews.author: Pierre Constantin
google_reviews.review: Julia and her entire staff are very professional, prompt to respond and smart in their managerial decisions.  I highly recommend Optimus Property Solutions

google_reviews.author: Jeremiah Keenan
google_reviews.review: Julia and the staff are honest and easy to deal with. You can only do good business with good people and they are great.

google_reviews.author: James Morland
google_reviews.review: This property management company is one of the worst ones Ive ever had to deal with. They dont listen to their clients, they dont even care to be on the property and they dont fulfill maintenance orders.

google_reviews.author: Amanda Hasbrouck
google_reviews.review: So far ok. They just took over managing our apt complex so still transitioning.

google_reviews.author: Pat James
google_reviews.review:
My opinion with my experience with Suzanne was that she was unprofessional,  arrogant,
condescending,  and rude.

google_reviews.author: Greg Spencer
google_reviews.review: Super friendly staff, took plenty of time showing me the unit and answering my questions.

google_reviews.author: Alexis Tejeda
google_reviews.review: Great member service very helpful i went ask for questions and i got all the answers to it

google_reviews.author: Maddy
google_reviews.review: Lisa has been so helpful with me in answering all my questions, she is kind, understanding and very quick to respond. I have never dealt with a property management company like this before. Give Lisa a raise!!!

google_reviews.author: Tom Rea
google_reviews.review: Always very courteous staff to assist with any ?

google_reviews.author: Aleksander Greenleaf (Alek)
google_reviews.review: Very friendly. Super direct about expectations.

google_reviews.author: Jodie James
google_reviews.review: Thank you Suzzane for everything!

google_reviews.author: Smiley Face
google_reviews.review: Rich company, poor values.

summary.text:
Good

Optimus Property Solutions has received commendable feedback from a number of tenants who praise their responsiveness and professionalism. Users have highlighted specific staff members like Julia, who is described as kind, friendly, and quick to resolve issues. One tenant shared a positive experience of living at a property managed by Optimus for seven years, expressing appreciation for Julia's approach to handling their needs efficiently.

Moreover, owners working with Optimus have also reported satisfaction, emphasizing the company's ability to communicate effectively and provide sensible advice regarding property management. This illustrates a commitment to maintaining a standard of care for their clients that can lead to long-term relationships and trust within the rental community.

Great

Several user reviews underscore the efficiency and support provided by Optimus Property Solutions. One individual noted that their property manager was not only knowledgeable but also patient in guiding them through complex issues, such as dealing with flooding. Another review enthusiastically compared Optimus to a top-tier management group, highlighting their professionalism and positive teamwork during challenging situations.

Bad

While there are several positive experiences, some reviews reveal troubling issues with communication and maintenance handling at Optimus Property Solutions. Numerous tenants described situations where maintenance requests went unaddressed for extended periods, leading to frustration over unresolved issues. Complaints about delayed responses and poor communication were common themes, with one user indicating a lack of follow-up even after persistent requests for repairs.

Ugly
